description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8nel9","text":"This protocol details a protocol for the trypsin digestion of PI3KC3-C1 and subsequent analysis of digested peptides using LC-MS/MS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"b0de8","text":"Materials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eb3ed","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96od4","text":"PI3KC3-C1 (mCherry-ATG14|VPS15-TSF) protein sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3f3fb","text":"Urea","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4a86","text":"tris(hydroxymethyl)aminomethane (TRIS) pH 8.0","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53eg3","text":"tris(2-carboxyethyl)phosphine (TCEP)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dvo7","text":"Iodoacetamide (IAA)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42kld","text":"Trypsin (Gold Trypsin, 0.5 mg/mL Promega V5280)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rhro","text":"CaCl2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":4,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f72s3","text":"NH4CH3CO2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":2,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":5,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":8,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4gug9","text":"Acetonitrile","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3cfal","text":"Formic acid (Optima LC-MS grade, 99.9% minimum)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bieg","text":"Water (purified using the Milli-Q Gradient system)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"39bmm","text":"Zorbax 300SB-C8 Micro Bore Rapid Resolution column (150 mm length, 1.0 mm inner diameter, 3.5 Âµm particle size, Agilent)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kgvc","text":"LC-MS system (e.g., Agilent 1200 series LC and Thermo Fisher Scientific LTQ-Orbitrap-XL mass spectrometer)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dcn6","text":"Proteome Discoverer software (version 1.3, Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

{"blocks":[{"key":"7rv8p","text":"Add Iodoacetamide (IAA) to achieve a final concentration of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"15","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hvr2","text":"Incubate the mixture at   for   to alkylate cysteine residues.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6tqcn","text":"Prepare a trypsin digestion solution containing Gold Trypsin (0.5 mg/mL),   TRIS  , and   CaCl2. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":94,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":88,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3cjd9","text":" Trypsin digestion solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dp9st","text":"      Gold Trypsin (0.5\n  mg/mL)  8 uL    50 mM TRIS pH 8  160 uL    100 mM CaCl2  2 uL  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":89}],"data":{}},{"key":"3k2cb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"8"}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"3":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["206","74"],"data":[["Gold Trypsin (0.5 mg/mL)","8 uL"],["50 mM TRIS pH 8","160 uL"],["100 mM CaCl\u003csub\u003e2\u003c/sub\u003e","2 uL"]],"guid":"284DE6B5ED6E4BD5B6BAFC5D5BCF225F","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Gold Trypsin (0.5 mg/mL)","8 uL"],["50 mM TRIS pH 8","160 uL"],["100 mM CaCl\u003csub\u003e2\u003c/sub\u003e","2 uL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f0q1l","text":"Mix the trypsin digestion solution with the alkylated protein sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"410mq","text":"Incubate the digestion mixture at     with shaking at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"52dec","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"200","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1v8ad","text":"Analyze the digested proteins by SDS-PAGE to confirm successful digestion. The absence of bands corresponding to the PI3KC3-C1 components indicates successful digestion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7k4pn","text":"Set up the LC system with a Zorbax 300SB-C8 Micro Bore Rapid Resolution column (150 mm length, 1.0 mm inner diameter, 3.5 Âµm particle size).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fiuti","text":"Implement the following gradient elution program:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bhkk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6hjvl","text":"Isocratic flow at 1% (volume/volume) B for  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ceun","text":"Linear gradient to 35% B over  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"310ep","text":"Linear gradient to 95% B over  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"14r77","text":"Isocratic flow at 95% B for  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1aa58","text":"Linear gradient to 1% B over  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"55okc","text":"Isocratic flow at 1% B for  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":360,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"5":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9h1b0","text":"Acquire full-scan, high-resolution mass spectra in positive ion mode over the m/z range of 340 to 1800 using the Orbitrap mass analyzer with a mass resolution of 60,000 (at m/z = 400, FWHM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbpab","text":"Select the ten most intense ions exceeding an intensity threshold of 10,000 raw ion counts from each full-scan mass spectrum for tandem mass spectrometry (MS/MS) analysis using collision-induced dissociation (CID).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"160o5","text":"Acquire MS/MS spectra using the linear ion trap.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c7trn","text":"Use Proteome Discoverer software (version 1.3, SEQUEST algorithm) to search raw data files against the amino acid sequences of mCherry-labeled Class III phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase complex I (mCherry-PI3KC3-C1) proteins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dppjp","text":"Consider tryptic peptides with up to three missed cleavages and specify post-translational modifications.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"avrqp","text":"Validate peptide assignments by manually inspecting MS/MS spectra.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
